snippet.title: Are you a psychopath?
snippet.content:
Each week, try your hand at a new set of wacky and weird questions designed to test your general knowledge about pop culture, geography, politics, music, sport, science, history and much more.
Are you up for the challenge? How much do you know about the world around you? Are you smarter than your friends and family?
Find out with our weekly brain teaser. Begin by pressing 'Start' below!
